Title: Opening Night
Actors: Gena Rowlands, John Cassavetes, Ben Gazzara, Joan Blondell
Plot: A young woman gets killed in an accident trying to meet her favorite actress Myrtle Gordon after a play. Then Myrtle Gordon felt responsible for the killing leading her down to an emotional crisis that interferes with her professional work as an actress.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
